requirement_text: We need an option for users to easily reset forgotten passwords, possibly through a security question or email verification.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to have a straightforward mechanism to reset my forgotten password, allowing me to recover access to the system using either a security question or email verification.

requirement_text: The app should support gestures for navigation to make it easier and more intuitive to use on touchscreen devices.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to navigate through the app using intuitive touchscreen gestures, so that I can access information and features quickly and easily.

requirement_text: Users need an option to undo actions to prevent accidental mistakes, such as deleting an important file.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be able to undo the deletion of a file, so that I can easily correct accidental mistakes and maintain the integrity of my data.

requirement_text: A feature to create and manage groups would help users collaborate and communicate more effectively.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be able to create and manage groups, so that I can easily collaborate and communicate with others.
